Room.Name: Highland Avenue/Orchard Lane/Tranquility Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the three-way intersection of Highland Avenue, Orchard Lane and Tranquility Way, coming together in the northeastern corner of town.
Room.LongDescription: Highland Avenue runs south out of the intersection, forming the eastern boundary of the city. Tranquility Way runs to the northwest, passing by the Oceancrest Military Headquarters on the north side of town, and Orchard Lane heads to the west.
